title: BRIEF-Azumah Resources Advises Shareholders Take No Action In Relation To Ibaera Offer
text:
BRIEF-Azumah Resources Advises Shareholders Take No Action In Relation To Ibaera Offer

Stock Markets 37 minutes ago (Sep 18, 2019 20:02)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Azumah Resources Advises Shareholders Take No Action In Relation To Ibaera Offer Sept 18 (Reuters) - Azumah Resources Ltd : * BOARD OF AZUMAH ADVISES SHAREHOLDERS TAKE NO ACTION IN RELATION TO UNSOLICITED OFFER FROM PRIVATE EQUITY FUND, IBAERA * BOARD OF AZUMAH IS NOW REVIEWING UNSOLICITED OFFER FROM IBAERA

BRIEF-Azumah Resources Advises Shareholders Take No Action In Relation To Ibaera Offer
